title: The Seasons of Yamato
overview: Here is the high-resolution movie by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara Prefecture, with exclusive pieces which a pianist, Mine Kawakami, played on the "Hyakunen (100-year-old) Piano." The light and sound create a poetic video to make you experience each season. Cast (Piano): Mine Kawakami "Yamato-no-Kisetsu," composed by Mine Kawakami
